translations: n．派对，聚会（bash的复数形式）：一个欢乐的、随意的社交聚会。
· We attended several bashes last weekend.
上周末我们参加了几个派对。
v．猛击，猛烈攻击（bash的第三人称单数形式）：用力击打或攻击某物或某人。
· He bashes the ball with all his strength.

sentences.sentence: He threw one of the biggest showbiz bashes of the year as a 36th birthday party for Jerry Hall.
sentences.translation: 他为杰里•霍耳的36岁生日举行了该年度娱乐界最盛大的名流派对。

sentences.sentence: He grabs hold of the cell door, rears his head back and bashes it into the metal bars.
sentences.translation: 他抓紧了牢门，向后仰头然后用力撞向金属栅栏条。
